title: Forecast Final Project Cost
description: At the 50% completion mark, a project manager needs to forecast the final project cost based on performance to date.

tasks.description: Retrieve the project's Budget at Completion (BAC), Earned Value (EV), and Actual Cost (AC).
Calculate the Cost Performance Index (CPI) and Estimate at Completion (EAC).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates CPI = EV/AC = 0.91 and EAC = BAC/CPI = $550k.

tasks.description: Generate a report indicating a forecasted cost overrun of $50,000.
tasks.expected_outcome: A cost forecast report is generated with the key metrics and conclusion.
